data.text: Wish I could give this app a 4.5 rating, it's nearly perfect. Any issues that come up are resolved very quickly by their staff. Sending money is very reliable as long as the receiving party doesn't have any issues on their end My only complaint with the app, is it no longer shows how much money I can send before running into the limits. Before it would show daily, monthly and 180 days in the profile section, but now that feature is completely missing. Please bring it back, very useful.

I am a long time user of Remitly. I am very happy with this service, but the newest version of the App is annoying. When you are done using the App, you can't shut it off easily. I swipe up, which brings up options on every other App on my phone, except Remitly. I have to swipe down, and bring up my phone's settings options, then go to my home screen from there. This needs to be corrected, like yesterday. Hijacking People's web browser is not a path to satisfied users.
data.replyText: We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with our latest version of the Remitly app. We appreciate your feedback and understand the frustration caused by the difficulty in closing the app. Our team is actively working on resolving this issue to ensure a smoother user experience. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

data.text: I use Remitly often, and I appreciate the quick manner in which they send the money. I also like that their quotes to transfer are much larger than other apps. Recently, they have also added pix which allows me to send money faster to other people I couldn't reach before. I had an issue and was able to solve the problem with 1 phone call. Highly recommend this app.
data.replyText: Hi, we truly appreciate your message and are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with our service. We look forward to serving you again in the future - Thank you for choosing Remitly!

data.text: Remitly was my to go app to send money, but lately, I am unhappy with the latest update. Although they changed the sending free from $3.99 to $1.99, the exchange rate is now very low compared to other apps/ places. I am honestly looking for another app to use instead of Remitly. Also, this app used to have the option to send money instantly, but now that option is no longer available.
data.replyText: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the latest update. We have taken note of your concerns regarding the exchange rate and the removal of the instant money transfer option. We appreciate your loyalty and will strive to address these issues to improve your experience.

data.text: I really liked remitly at first. It was easy to use and reasonable sending fee. The recipient received transfers within minutes in their bank account, but recently there has been problems and I'm needing to contact customer service. I paid the fee, but the transfer doesn't go through right away and the status is "In Progress". So what is the point of paying $3.99 for express when it's not express?! It's very inconvenient. I need to look for a new app to send money.
data.replyText: Hi, thank you for this feedback! We‚Äôre so sorry to hear about your experience. If you‚Äôre comfortable sending us more information, we‚Äôd like to investigate what happened. Please fill out this form https://bit.ly/3ufZsLZ so we can help.

data.text: I'm changing my review. This application is really good, and Customer Service is exceptional. I got disconnected and they called back. There is a major flaw with the "Send Again" button. I was looking at a transaction I made the day before and the Send Again button is on the screen and it's large and really easy select. And I don't recall getting a confirmation prompt that let's you know you are sending a duplicate transaction and it processes IMMEDIATELY. MAJOR üêõ ü™≤ bug
data.replyText: Hi Ali, thank you for sharing this experience. We‚Äôre so sorry for the inconvenience and we understand how frustrating this must be. We‚Äôd like to make this right. Please give us a call or chat with us directly at https://remit.ly/143d2yr so we can help! -Your Remitly Team

data.text: The WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE ever. I've been using it for a year using it for many transactions. But recently when I had an issue (I chose Express service, supposed to be Within 4 hours as on their advertising, but turned out 5 days as the Economy service), I tried to called few times to find the answer, they Kept Putting me on Hold for more than 15mins, and when I tried to reach out to them, they just Ignored me so that I would hang up the phone myself. Tried to speak to a supervisor, no news
data.replyText: Hi Tuyet, we understand this can be frustrating. We are working towards making this better. We would appreciate it if you could send us the details at http://remit.ly/143d2yr. | Your Remitly Team

data.text: A truly simple, affordable, and reliable money transfer app. I was very skeptical about using the app but after making several transfers ai have grown to appreciate the simplicity of using the app and especially the security and reliability of making international transfers. Big banks charge way too much to and take too long. Check it out, you won't be disappointed.

App is very easy to use, delivery is fast, reliable and secure. It's also amazing how they try to reply to each and every review posted here! One thing though, I found about 3-4 competitors that offer way much higher exchange rates (usd to php) as much as $1.30 higher! This tempted me to try other services, even if delivery is not as fast. If Remitly will be competitive in this area, surely they will be the best.

The app is fairly easy to use and gives a good exchange rate, but a few things don't add up, though: The fee for sending money with economy or express is the same ($4.99. Which is kind of high, considering other apps). It should be cheaper if is going to take 6 whole days to get to the other bank. Also, they say express takes 4 hours, when in reality it takes more, almost a full day. This is very inconvenient, in case you have to send money for an emergency to a family or friend in need.

I have used remitly many times. They were a fast service with cheap fees. I had one issue one time, but it was resolved very quickly.. Recently, my own bank canceled the transaction, reciting potential fraud. Now it seems there is a problem with the money reaching my destination in a timely manner again. The fees have raised for Express delivery in 10 minutes. It's now been 7+ hours and the money still has not arrived but it left my account immediately. Customer service is always available tho.

Excellent service and the best app to send money. Been using for almost 2 years now. I've tried a couple others, but always come back to Remitly. They finally added ACH and debit cards to receive money. Best customer service. Chat is often available and the reps are always helpful. I can basically manage my own transactions; cancel etc on my own. Rates are a little delayed and the Android widget doesn't have an option for different update increments. As close to perfect as it can be.

Installed it and the app offered a promotional exchange rate. I got all the way to the last page. When I hit the Send button, they suddenly told me that rate wasn't available to me anymore. They told me it was only available to first time users...but I WAS a first time user?? I had to contact support for them to tell me that it was removed because of some household policy regarding 3 accts attached to one address. This is extremely aggravating design. The UI needs to be better

I really enjoyed using Remitly due to its easy and user-friendly interface. It has proven to be a reliable platform. However, I have noticed that the widget feature, which was extremely helpful for quickly checking the destination price, has been removed in the recent update. I genuinely miss this feature and wonder if there is any possibility of bringing it back.
data.replyText: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the recent update. We love the widget as well and are working on enhancing it and bringing it back in the near future.

data.text: Been using this for a while and everything was going fantastic. Then one day I sent money and it showed not delivered. I contact them and they say it was canceled due to an error of bank account and to try again. I do and same thing happens. I ask to cancel and get my money back. Never got my money back so I dispute. They threaten to suspend my account unless I pay them back for a transaction that was NEVER made. I would be careful with this app. Definitely not using this again.

I've been using Remitly for years and have nothing but positive comments. I highly recommend it to anyone who wishes to safely send money transfers internationally without having to worry about fraud or a long wait. They have two options instant tranfers paid with credit/debit cards and an economy option which you use by linking your bank account. The economy does take a few days, so only use when you have time. The app is also user friendly.
data.replyText: Thank you ‚Äî this is great to hear. We‚Äôre grateful for your feedback.

data.text: The app is fast (15min at most) interface is user-friendly, easy and safe to use. Well done. There was absolutely no issue or whatsoever. They do what they say. The only reason im giving 4 stars is that there is only one option of withdrawal (only cash) I wish I could just transfer money on my credit card of the bank in which I transfer money. In that case you could just transfer money from one country's IBAN to another's credit card.

This has got to be the worst platform I've used to wire transfers. Made a new account, after sending a few payments, was blocked from sending anymore. Went through several phone calls w/ customer service to which were unable to resolve my problem. They would even hang up while on call w me, happened 3 times already. Have to make repeated payments where the platform is finnicky. Sometimes it goes through, sometimes not. There is NO definite reason why I'm experiencing these problems. 0 stars

Use anything but Remitly! I only used it at the request of someone in Mexico. I spent an hour entering information, snapping photos of my license, and entering recipient info. After all was said and done, I was "deactivated". I have a perfect credit rating, and called to find out why.. They merely said my account was not approved. I am left with the impression that the app is merely a vehicle for collecting personal information.

The app is super easy to use. As long as you get the banking details right. Messed up by 1 number the first time but the 2nd time it went through. And the customer service is pretty great too. They helped me cancel the first transaction that i messed up on. I'm really glad to have found this app because now i can support my friend and their family in another country without having to wait too long for the money to transfer over. 5‚òÜ

I really love using Remitly, it is quick and easy. Even after recent updates the UI on my OnePlus 6T missed almost all last digits and letters and also some information has been cut out. It seems like there is no way to know like the dates for economy transfer and certain information because it is not done properly for Android. Though I do not hear problem as such in iOS. It is definitely worth the look because it completely turns you off in using the app after seeing half words. Thanks!

What a waste of time putting all my info in to set up an account and have every transaction cancelled. Tried three different payment methods and every one rejected. Jumped on Western Union and goes through on the first try. Security is one thing....failure to provide the basic service you set out to provide is another. Never use this service again.

I ended up coming over to this app when my other remit app removed Poland from one of the access points. As somebody who works internationally in several different countries, and has bank accounts in different countries, Remotely makes it exceedingly easy to plan ahead, and move money quickly. it has been very easy, reliable, and I would recommend it to anyone who is working and living abroad.

When I first started using the app everything was great. All of a sudden my account was locked which I thought would be a quick fix. I was wrong 3 months later my account is still locked and all I need is my transaction history. Apparently it's impossible to unlock my account. Customer service is no help at all. It's hard to believe that Noone in the entire company can unlock my account and send my transaction history.
data.replyText: Hi LaTashia, we‚Äôre sorry to hear about your experience. As a regulated financial institution, we‚Äôre required to follow anti-fraud and anti-money laundering guidelines to keep customers safe. If you think we made a mistake, we‚Äôd be happy to investigate. Please visit help.remitly.com/s/article/account-suspended for help.

data.text: I was a western union customer but recently the app started playing up by not allowing me to use my any payment method(i have tried all of my cards ..my debit,credit and even a bank transfer but nothing worked out). Customer service was terrible too as they did not come up with any solution except telling me to reinstall the app, which did not work out as well. Today, I downloaded this app and I was able to send money in 3 minutes. Best app to send money overseas. Keep it up guys.

Remitly, as described in many reviews below, is too aggressive and rather wrong-headed about its "security" approach. I agree that they do the right thing to verify sender and recipient info. But they collect so much information, then suspend your account with no reason given, and you are locked out of their service. If you started any transactions, they are cancelled, so the reason you wanted to use their service in the first place is no longer available, AND YOU DON'T KNOW WHY.
data.replyText:
Hi Simon, we are very sorry to hear you had an inconvenience while using our service. As a reliable remittance company, we would like to follow up on you case. Please contact us at 1-888-REMITLY (1-888-736-4859).Our customer service team is available to help you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week or send us an email to service@remitly.com

Team Remitly/

data.text: Easy to use and set up on your phone. One problem is that you can't send money inside the United States? A second problem is that the overseas stores that distrube the money have limits for how much money you can send during a certain time period. Because of that sometimes I had to use other apps to send money, like Western Union which is very expensive. Otherwise great app, low fees to send money. Sends a text message to recipient including the code to pick up the money. Great customer service

They have a descent setup and good review. Unfortunately my money was in transition for 3 days. I decided to cancel it and try something else because they needed the money immediately. I could not cancel like it said I could so I called the 1-800 and got a guy to cancel it for me customerservice was pleasant and helpful. But informed me that it could bue 10 days to get my money back so I had to find more money to send. I will not use this app again.
data.replyText:
We are sorry to learn about this, thank you for sharing your experience. At this time we cannot locate your account based on the contents of this review, could you please reach out via Remitly.com/help or by calling (888) 736-4859 so we can address your specific concern? Our Customer Care team is available 24/7 to assist you.

*Your Remitly Team

data.text: Deceptive fee practices. 1st transaction they waive their fee, in this case 3.99, as an introductory offer. The exchange rate was 1usd=53pesos which was a really good rate. Made the transaction with no issues and the money was transferred really fast. Attempted to do a second transaction an hour later, the fee was there this time which was expected, but now the exchange rate was 1usd=49pesos. They are hiding additional fees within the exchange rate. Better off using Wise or World Remit.
data.replyText: Hi Wayne, thank you for this feedback! We‚Äôre so sorry to hear about your experience. If you‚Äôre comfortable sending us more information, we‚Äôd like to investigate what happened. Please fill out this form https://bit.ly/3ufZsLZ so we can help.

data.text: The app is is very easy to use, fair pricing and fast. I used this app for awhile sending money to China through Alipay, but after December, all transitions were no longer went through. I tried to communicate with both side customer service, no one can give me an answer. I don't know if this is only my problem or due to China restrictions you can no longer using Alipay account receiving money from the U.S. Then I have to use another app worldremit without any problem.

Remotely serves a valuable purpose - but with a price. To Mexico, they charge $4 in fees on top of a reduced exchange rate, so for small dollar remittances ($100 for example), you could easily be paying 8-9% in fees if you send Express with lost purchasing power. If you transfer $500 or more, they waive the $4 fee which if it's feasible, I highly recommend - Instead of sending $100 a month, send $500 every 5 months as you will save $20 in fees.

The app doesn't give you enough control over the money transfer process. It merely acts as a facade to a cumbersome and inherently complex business process when you cancel transaction and is no better than any traditional bank. Moreover, there is no way for you to get timely response either via the app or their escalation process email. I wouldn't recommend using this unless you really want to take a hit and transfer, urgent money to your loved ones.

Horrible customer Service. App is deceptive in exchange rate. Shows a different amount but transfers different. I will 100% not recommend it. Had a Very bad experience. Also they didn't even give an option for promotion or the 20$ discount the offer you get in the link. False advertisement. Customer Service is horrible because it's thru chat only. They just simply can't help and on top of that threat you of policies. I mean really!!! Very Bad Experience and horrible service.

Initially gave Remitly 3 stars but they fixed most of my issues and deserve a better rating. Update!!!! I was wrong. Poor customer service. A customer service agent actually ended a chat with me saying goodbye to me and not offering up any suggestions to address my issues. It appears that Remitly is still trying to figure itself out. I will leave the app to other places for a while.
data.replyText: We regret to note this. Please contact us at https://www.remitly.com/us/en/home/contact with your contact details so that we can address your concern. Due to COVID-19 safety precautions, we are operating with limited staff. Hope that you and your family are healthy and safe during these uncertain and unprecedented times. |Your Remitly Team

data.text: Horrendous! My transaction was stopped (after a deceptive note staying funds would be available in 30 mins) requesting I provide a bank statement. That was fine. However on sending another sum of the same amount, the next day, i was told to provide the same documentation, source of funds, my employer and my employment. And then after all this they cancel my transaction and my account! No reason given by customer service. Only something about a "robust security system". A waste of time and effort!
data.replyText:
Hello,

We are very sorry if our service has not met your expectations. If you have a complaint, our goal is to learn and address your concerns. Complaints between you and us regarding our service may be reported to us by email by using us-complaints@remitly.com. 

: Your Remitly Team

data.text: Was the best app for sending money internationally. Simple. Quick. Intuitive. Reliable. I recommended it to all my friends and family. Now I will not. They recently froze my account with no warning. I asked them to review and they replied they have reviewed and can not reactivate my account. I asked for a reason why and all they said was I violated their user agreement. No further details how. Unprofessional. I'll find better and Remitly can cash me outside how bow dat.

Money never makes it to the destination. Sent my pay stubs, a 2 years worth of bank statements, filled out 2 colombian forms for pagos, and still not able to send the money almost a month later. Getting ahold of customer service is almost impossible and when you do they have pre-made responses to get you off the phone or out of the chat. They will not check their email or email/call their partner bank to check on your transfer without you first contacting the customer service.
data.replyText: Hi IDontWantA. We sincerely apologize that your experience with our service is less than satisfactory. We would like to hear more about what happened to make sure that it will be addressed. Please log in to your Remitly account and chat with us directly at http://remit.ly/143d2yr, we will do what we can to make this right. & Your Remitly Team

data.text: I'm leaving 2 stars because their rates are the best out there. But every single time I pay for express, I need to chase customer service around to complete the transaction so the money can be picked up causing long delays. Since COVID-19 their support has worsened a 1000 fold. Now express takes a week if you're lucky to get through to someone on the live chat. I currently have an urgent transaction and the live chat isn't working. Tried diff browsers. Remitly, please complete my transaction!

This app is the answer for sending money anywhere at any time you don't have to leave bed!! I love how fast and easy it is to use. I love the customer service, (I did once have an issue but they helped me real quick!). I refer many people to this app and they are as satisfied as I am, also Remitly gives you a $10 reward if you refer a new customer to them! Keep up the good work Remitly!!

Did 1st transaction with them (transferring from MY overseas account to MY local account). Had to call & provide a copy of my ID & bank statement to verify the transfer. Understandable, it's my 1st transaction. I was told it would be one-time, only on 1st transfer, where I'd need to verify. 2nd transaction I had to contact them to verify again. 3rd transaction went through. 4th transaction they need full ID & statement AGAIN. Smh. I don't recommend using their service. Big waste of time!
data.replyText: Hi Kae W, thank you for your feedback! Because we‚Äôre a regulated financial institution, we‚Äôre required to collect info to verify your identity and keep our service safe ‚Äî so we may ask you to send us supporting documents or answer a few questions. We know this can feel personal, and the security of your information is our priority.

data.text: Easy to use and best rates when sending through economy mode. Only thing lacking is a feature that let's you download all the transactions performed in the past say 1year for example or say in between 2 date values. Note to developer: it would be awesome if this feature is made available. Think about it.

I try to send money and they hold my transaction because apparently is information missing from my bank. But the already took the money. I try to fix it but their options take you to nowhere. I have to look up for the phone number because they website say if you can not cancel call us, but no phone number, no chat, no clear info to fix or cancel. And when you call, they send you to the email and they hang up. I'm so mad at this service.
data.replyText: We regret to know your dissatisfaction with us. We appreciate your feedback, Lili. Please tells us more about your concern. Go to http://help.remitly.com so we can assist you accordingly. Due to COVID-19 safety precautions, we are operating with limited staff. We remain committed to serving you. _Your Remitly Team

data.text: I joined yesterday and send money to myself because I heard this is a good option but if you don't have the exact name as the passport you will have problems. Caribe express needs the exact name or you can not pick up money. I tried changing the recipient name myself and it did not work. I chat online with a representative and they added my middle name as a second last name causing more problems. Customer service is incompetent and tell you yes they will help you when they can not.
data.replyText: Dear Gino, We appreciate your time and effort contacting us. We would like to sincerely apologize for the unpleasant experience that you recently had with us. Your satisfaction is our highest priority. It will be a pleasure to assist you with any concern you might have. please contact us directly at http://remit.ly/143d2yr. The Remitly Team.

data.text: Literally the worst app I've ever used, the staff and customer service are way too incompetent to even have a conversation with. I was transferred over 4 times and every person I spoke with couldn't fix the problem. Complete waste of time, I spent 4 hours trying to solve 1 simple issue and I just ended up sending my money another way. Don't recommend at all.
data.replyText:
We apologize for the difficulties you experienced while registering with us. If you would like some assistance or additional information, please contact us via https://www.remitly.com/us/en/home/contact and we will be happy to help you further.
‚ô£ Your Remitly Team

data.text: Matt your App Sucks! I understand security but I question all the requested info and after all of that, the transaction was on hold. Not as good a PayPal, but hear it has issues in Kenya. Ended up using WorldRemit and it was quick easy and transaction happened in minutes with no hold. I don't recommend this app or service! Now will have to wait 10 days to see if my $10.00 is credited and refunded back to me! ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨
data.replyText: Hello Dana. Thank you for raising this concern to our attention. Please note that we carefully review transfers to make sure they follow our policies. This helps us safeguard personal information, protect our business from illegal activity, and keep our service safe for everyone. Please refer to our user agreement for more information.

data.text: Absolute waste of time. I had to transfer money to may family in a timely manner but in the course of 3 days i kept getting messages about verifying my identification. Every single time I sent the verification I was told the money would be sent the same day but I was put on hold 3 seperate times because for some reason 3 verifications were not enough to verify my identity. I had made a transfer last year and the process was much faster but I don't know what happened this time. Never again.
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look and investigate the issue. If you could please reach out to our customer support team at http://remit.ly/143d2yr. Your Remitly Team /

data.text: Always paid with my debit card, remitly required copies of multiple bank statements, copy of my pay stub, copy of passport and driver's license. All was fine for about 4 months of transfers then they cut me off as a customer. No reason given. All my funds always cleared without a problem. Terrible company do not do business with it. I contacted the customer service team before posting the review and they couldn't tell me why.
data.replyText: Hello Kevin. We're truly sorry to hear that and we would love to take a look at the issue. Please reach out to our customer support team at http://remit.ly/143d2yr.

data.text: One of the worse experiences with a money transfer app. Sent money twice with 'express ' option as advertised but express to them mean 2 days transfer time when others get it done in less than 2 minutes. Contacted customer service but it's all same story.. Still waiting for partner to complete transfer. Diabolical! The only reason I gave it 2 star is only because of the exchange rate if not I would give it only one star. Deleting this app once transfer is completed.

Mostly, transactions are quick and smooth without any issues. I have found, on one occasion when something went wrong, Remitly were not as good as they could have been at taking responsibility from the outset to fix it. They did in the end. However things don't, generally, go wrong. I haven't found any provider as easy to use as Remitly and I've tried a few. They remain, by far, my preferred money transfer provider.
data.replyText: Hi, we truly appreciate your message and are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with our service. We look forward to serving you again in the future - Thank you for choosing Remitly!

data.text: this is a very simple to use and amazing app the very first time you do the transaction You may end up having to go through a couple of security questions from remitly to ensure there is no fraud. after that is very automatic and simple a great way to send money to family or friends

Great at beginning then decided to block my account and couldn't even give me direct reason. Requested a call with higher management to get some answers after a lengthy phone call.. agreed to call within a hour, never called just sent a email declaring my account been permanently blocked still with no explanation .plus the app isn't free it has hidden charges. Their rates always higher than other apps. AVOID üëç

I'll give credit where it's due - this company is legit. It promises and delivers on its services. I've used it several times to transfer large sums from the UK to the Philippines all without hassle (unlike some other FX services that have far too many red tape). The transfer process is clear and the status updates are very prompt. Also has very competitive FX rates especially if you send via bank transfer. A far better alternative to Western Union.

Longtime user. Transfers are usually instantaneous. No security concerns to date. $1.99 per transfer fee irrespective of the sum transferred, expensive for the smaller dollar amounts I often send. There is no in-app way to notate the purpose of a transfer for record keeping. 5 stars if notation was possible and smaller sum transfer was cheaper.

This is a very very horrible app!!!!!!I already send my information details many times and still they won't approved it!!!i really really need to send the money IMMEDIATELY! but they still keep it on hold until the approval comes and they're asking to call their contact number as they need more information?!!!DO NOT download this app!!!!

Fantastic money transfer service,great customer service, moved to this service from Western Union money transfer which was dodgy and since I'm using it i completely left other money transfer apps.. i think there's no comparison, Remitly is one of the best money transfer service. There are some areas where they should work on and make it easier and clearer, Some people who are complaining it is only because they don't know how to use this App. There are some points where new users get confused

Used the app once to send money to someone and everything was fine. Went to use it again today, and they declined my transfer. I called to inquire and they said they're shutting down my account for suspicious activity, but didn't have reason why. ü§î My money and bank accounts are legit, so this is weird. Guess I won't be using it again ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry to hear about your experience, and we're committed to making things right. To understand the situation better and take the necessary steps, could you share more details through this form? https://bit.ly/3ufZsLZ. We appreciate your patience as we work to resolve this for you.

data.text: I use the app successfully 2 times but on my third try it canceled my transaction. I thought it was me by sending a bigger amount but when I tried a lowered amount it got canceled again. It says the bank canceled the transaction but my bank tells me it never got to them to cancel. It was an easy to use app and I don't know what happened.
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry to hear about your experience, and we're committed to making things right. To understand the situation better and take the necessary steps, could you share more details through this form? https://bit.ly/3ufZsLZ. We appreciate your patience as we work to resolve this for you.

data.text: this is one of the best apps for sending money. the app is smooth to navigate and previous beneficiaries are stored to reduce the stress of repeat filling in of details. I like it. However, it will be great to make the fast payment more faster, say in 2 days max.

Very good app fast and reliable and no fees and the exchange rate is ok.. I guess due to the fact that they don't charge for fees is why the rate is slightly different from other apps. Apart from that you can always count on this app.

I have been using this app for over 5 years with little fixable issue a few times but since yesterday, i have been trying to send money but the send again button kept rolling on refresh forever, blank page rolling nonstop. Fix your app, or I will take my business somewhere else.

Remitly is fantastic for overseas bank transfers, and much faster and cheaper than the high street banks. However, it would be good if businesses could use it to send payment requests. A Wordpress / WooCommerce plugin for website purchases would be great. IMPORTANT. If ANYBODY claiming to be from a bank, business, a friend, or even HMRC contacts you requesting a money, IGNORE the email or phone call, and don't be afraid to ask a friend or family member for advice first. Many thanks Remitly

It's so easy to send money. They have express and economic, you can choose whichever one you'd like. There's no glitch, it's an amazing way to send money to loved ones, and the process is so easy. Thank you Remitly, now I can send money hassle free.

Absolute pile of shite. Worked fine for 2 years and then they froze my account and asked me for clarification on who I was sending money to (my wife and myself mostly) told me account would be cleared after 48hrs. 3 weeks later still frozen. Constantly ringing up and getting told its under review and would be 48hrs. No one taking ownership. Telling me they can't even contact the team that deals with the clearance. My money still held up and unable to be received.

used for the first time, after verifying my own account with my ID, I sent a 100‚Ç¨ (i used WorldRemit & Western Union before), they immediately blocked the transaction & after wasting 2 hours they asked me for "Receiver's ID". Which is ridiculous. why should i as a sender verify the receiver? and why would Receiver sent me their ID (other than trusted family or friends). Sending Receiver's ID is not Sender's task. you can ask Receiver for that. it's their ID & privacy. use world remit app

absolutely the best, easy to use, always fast and fees that are a pleasure to pay. Use the app several times a quarter. TransferWise sucks in comparison on every level - they try to charge me ¬£20 for a transaction GBP to AUD whereas Remitly charges ¬£2.99. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
data.replyText: Hi, we truly appreciate your message and are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with our service. We look forward to serving you again in the future - Thank you for choosing Remitly!

data.text: I tried to use this to send money internationally. The process looked simple but it was a no go. My account got locked and suspended on the 1st try . I asked for help as to why and the simple reply was I can't use this anymore. I can only laugh at how funny this is. Almost seems like a scam. Now I can't even delete my information since my account is locked. Time to get a new debit card due to this. F-
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry to hear about your experience, and we're committed to making things right. To understand the situation better and take the necessary steps, could you share more details through this form? https://bit.ly/3ufZsLZ. We appreciate your patience as we work to resolve this for you.

data.text: Really hard to use to send money. They ask for a ton of data in comparison to western union. They also took a lot lot of time to verify my acount, hours to do so withmany calls and between. They didn't even got to verify my adress yet because they don't accept Arabic documents or proofs. It was really a very bad experience for me and I don't believe I'm going use there services again. They really should see how Al Ansari, western union, Al Fardan, or any other competitor is making it easy.

FEEL LIKE I SHOULD HAVE AVIOD FIRST TIME. Absolutely rabish company. First, let my transaction smoothly, but after the last transaction I made, they held it, asking me to provide my ID, which I gave but then made an excuse again and asking to send the recipient ID, and delaying unnecessary. DONT BE FOOL BY THEM SAYING FEE FREE TRANSACTION ACTUALLY HOLDING YOUR MONEY.

Terrible app!! As soon as I open it says 'Something is not right, try again later' but no matter how many times I retry or reinstall it still doesn't work. would never recommend and this issue needs sorting!

Convienent- sure. User interface - really good All this good stuff is due to low exchange rates I suspect! Why cant u match or do better than western union? Your rates are always higher than.them Also why you keep asking irrelevant questions and upload ID docs despite being verified? It appears they keep your existing transfer on hold tp satisfy their made up requirements despite being having fully verified accounts, stay away , lots of hassles and severe headaches.. Customer service is rude
data.replyText: Hi, we're sorry to hear about your experience, and we're committed to making things right. To understand the situation better and take the necessary steps, could you share more details through this form? https://bit.ly/3ufZsLZ. We appreciate your patience as we work to resolve this for you.

data.text: Great app and service. My only complaint is that they constantly increase transfer fees on top of the already lower exchange rate you get. So you pay more both on higher transfer fees and a lower exchange rate.
Smooth App UI, good transfer options. Considering fees and exchange rate it's a good bargain. Also, their security team calls you (if needed) to confirm transactions in a timely manner.

Not Recommend even not Worth 1 Star ‚≠ê Made a transfer today, I'm overseas employee, first they ask for identity proof so i provided and verified, then they asked for proof address, i provided mu Bank statement for the same address, they didn't accept that, then i provided government issued employment and address written letter they didn't accepted that at last i provided my carrier bill with the same written they didn't accept that either. i provided 3 docs with same address. Bad Experience.

"Remitly is an exceptional money transfer service that I wholeheartedly recommend. From my personal experience, Remitly consistently delivers swift and hassle-free transactions, making it my preferred choice for sending money abroad. Their user-friendly interface and transparent fee structure inspire confidence, while their competitive exchange rates ensure that recipients receive maximum value. Overall, I am thoroughly impressed with Remitly's commitment to customer satisfaction.
Initially UPI option was available on remitly and added to convince now the UPI menu is not available and instead there is a blue box that says for technical reasons UPI is under maintenance.
it's really simple and easy to use , but they need to make the exchange rate a little bit more competitive than oder . the app are good and simple.
so far I have found it alright. rates are however on a lower side and with economy mode you need to plan in advance, if you need a good rate
Higher exchange rate than most money transfer apps. More options to send money. Very simple to navigate.
I was surprised how easy it was for me to use Remitly to send money to Brazil using Brasil Pix or CPF numbers. I need to buy costumes from makers there, and this app has helped immensely.
A great, fast, concise, and flawless service. The best money transfer service I've across so far.
Great App. Easy to use and absolutely no problem transferring or receiving money. Remitly even honored their word by giving me $25 for inviting a friend who used their app. Thanks remitly!

Been using remitly for years without issues receiving money from my husband. But today my husband tried transferring to my dollar account but it didn't go through so he transferred the Naira to my dollar account which they should have refunded immediately since is not permitted but for hours now we are still waiting. And there is no customer care line to contact anyone on the app. Please rectify thank you

I have been use this app for long time but now this app is so annoying , they keep my one payment and didn't gave me back my money which I really need it, and saying my payment is ready for pickup which is not, totally scam and fraud.... don't waste your time and money here!!

I can no longer login to my account whether it is in the app, website or on another device. All I get are these errors, which lead me to believe I have been locked out. Calling in was no help because I repeatedly get told everything is fine because I was able to login before. There is no issue with my login info or internet connection. They give so many empty promises and it's been two months now.

I tried sending money and they said im blocked contacted them and their answer was We've reviewed your request to reactivate your Remitly profile and have made the decision to leave it permanently deactivated.  This means we won't be able to process any future transfers on your behalf. Unfortunately, we cannot provide any additional insight into this matter or reconsider this decision.

remotely let's me send more money than other companies! this is my second time using it and I haven't had a problem. usually they'll put a hold on my fund because I send more than 500 for my house in mexico but not with remitly!
Third time sending money to Brazil without any issues. The money was required urgently and Remitly got it there! Thank you Remitly üôè üòä üíì
Excellent app and facility. It makes transfers to non-traditional places possible for those unable to use major banking organizations
I really like this app . the exchange rate is very good and it's easy to send funds securely....thank you !!!! finally

I would not recomend this app. Though the app has worked well in many transfers if you ever have an issue it is a nightmare to get it resolved. I sent a transfer to mexico. For some reason the account wouldnot accept it so I used western Union...But Remitly has failed to refund my money and its been 3 weeks now. The text messages they send say if no edit is done withen 24hrs the amount will be refunded...LIE...everyday when i get the message i go in my account and Cancel the transfer.
easy to use app and gets money to my love ones in Mexico so fast. can send them the money from any place with this app.
Started using remitly a couple of days ago and to be honest, this is the overall best transfer platform in the entire world 10/10 easy!

They will boot off their regular customers after a while. I have been sending money for months, maybe a year now and if they find one single thing they don't like, even the purpose of the sent money, they will suspend your account. Customer Service doesn't even help, everything reported is unclear in the Customer Service dept. Resending or correcting past info you have to jump through hoops as well esp to cancel them. I don't write reviews usually, but this needs to be heard.
the last update messed everything up always asking to add my credit card and looks like it just keeps asking it over and over again fix this crazy problem

hands down the best way to send money to your family, best rates, fast service, a wide range of money transfer companies that they send through, I had a authorized western union money transfers business years ago including other services, this company Remitly is far more better than any other company out there and I've been sending threw them all, once again no one has these transfer rates, more success to remitly.

I am officially done with remitly!! They are freaking crooks!! They offered a reward of $20 for referrals using your link. I was having issues with the link so I called them to tell them the issue. They denied me the $20 because they said that's how they track the referrals.. This is a bogus company and they will trick you to get out of giving you anything. I've referred 5 people so far and have gotten nothing. I don't recommend. Use another transfer company and app... They never explained it...

They are very straight forward with what they charge to send money. The recipients have several options to pick up the money. The app is simple to use. I can send money immediately, and often times with no fees. Great app to send money!
data.replyText: Hi, we truly appreciate your message and are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with our service. We look forward to serving you again in the future - Thank you for choosing Remitly!

data.text: Rubbish service. Shows transfer time in minutes, but then emails you to say it could take 2 business days, do not use this service. Us WU or similar, they do not have these unnecessary delays, especially if you are sending money with urgency. You are not warned in Advance you may experience such a delay. Truly Disappointing service.
just started using it after having problems using wu (unexplainable low limits). this is very user friendly, easy and no fuss. hopefully it stays like this.

Someone used it the first to send me money..it was very okay..not untill we tried it the second time on 21st/02/24..upto now the money hasn't yet reached and all the tell us the department is working on it..and keep giving us 24hrs upto now..its better someone uses another app..remitly no..
